distributors

At Selcouth Cycles we happily service all bike makes and models. Our certified bike mechanics are here to help you with all of your repair and maintenance needs, from minor adjustments to complete overhauls.


WHEEL REFRESHER
$49.99

Ensure your wheels are in good shape for that next ride.
  • Comprehensive true and dish
  • Rebuild hubs
  • Bring wheel to correct tension
  • Replace damged nipples/spokes
  • Replace rim tape
  • Scrub-a-dub

SAFETY CHECK
$49.99

Ideal pre-ride check up for bikes in good shape.
  • Check bicycle for functionality/safety
  • Inflate tires
  • Lube chain/pivot points
  • Minor adjustments
  • Adjust barrel tweaks, touch-true wheels
  • Quick lube

COMPLETE TUNE-UP
$99.99

Get your bike finely tuned & lubricated.
  • Adjust brakes front & rear
  • Adjust derailleur front & rear (lube pulleys)
  • True wheels front & rear
  • Adjust all bearings
  • Lube chain & cables
  • Light cleaning

DELUXE TUNE-UP
$149.99

A comprehensive tune-up and cleaning.
  • Adjust brakes front & rear
  • Adjust derailleur front & rear (lube pulleys)
  • True wheels front & rear
  • Adjust all bearings
  • Lube chain & cables
  • Clean cranks, chain, cassette & derailleurs

FULL BIKE OVERHAUL
$299.99

Enjoy a bike that rides like new again.
  • Complete tune-up & drivetrain cleaning
  • Bike disassembly & cleaning
  • Headset, hubs & bottom bracket overhaul
  • Labor to change cables if needed
  • Labor to change handlebars tape/ grips
